questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Handicap sign board
D) Art and culture

B) At a beach
C) In front of a building
D) Inside a museum

B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

A) The building
B) The bird on the sign
C) The background scenery
D) People walking

B) A person
C) A sign with a bird on it

B) The ocean
C) A bookstore building
D) A forest

A) A bicycle
